code: export function displayDate(data){var date=new Date(data);var dateNow=new Date();var yearDif=dateNow.getFullYear()-date.getFullYear();if(yearDif===0){var dayDif=dateNow.getDay()-date.getDay();if(dayDif===0){var hourDif=dateNow.getHours()-date.getHours();if(hourDif===0){var minutesDif=dateNow.getMinutes()-date.getMinutes();if(minutesDif>=0&&minutesDif<5)return"1 минуту назад";if(minutesDif>=5&&minutesDif<10)return"5 минут назад";if(minutesDif>=10&&minutesDif<30){return"10 минут назад";}return"30 минут назад";}return"".concat(date.getHours(),":").concat(date.getMinutes());}return"".concat(date.getDay()," ").concat(date.toLocaleString("default",{month:"long"}));}return date.getFullYear()+"."+(date.getMonth()+1)+"_"+date.getDate();}
